item.title: Skool Review: Why More People are Joining Skool Lately
item.description: Update (20-01-2023): Hormozi started showing his magic for skool and he just launched “skool games”. Skool games will help anyone who doesnâ€™t have a proven offer, an audience, or any specific expertise a way to start their own business and make money! From last week, I am seeing a disucssion emerging around an online community and course hosting platform. Many online marketers who were monetizing facebook groups are transitioning their facebook groups to that platform.

item.title: Systeme.io Review: The Ultimate Funnel Builder with a Generous FREE Plan
item.description: Although being a student of Business Administration, I never confronted with the term “Funnel” in any marketing text books of my two universities and can’t even remember hearing the word in any of my professors lectures. But when I started my journey into Affiliate Marketing, I started hearing it from all over, from the begining till date. There are number of Software-as-a-Service Platform dedicated to offer Funnel Software for online businesses.

item.title: OLSP System Review: Know what Wayne Crowe brings into the table with the relaunch
item.description: I have a soft feeling for One Lead System Pixel aka OLSP System. Because my journey in Affiliate Marketing began with this platform. The story goes like this… I saw a sponsored ad on my Facebook which aroused my curiosity, so I clicked… I saw Wayne Crowe for the first time and he started talking something which I couldn’t realize… So I clicked the cross button in the tab… And an offer popped up all of a sudden… The offer was: I can earn $20 just by completing a course So I started the course… And my journey with affiliate marketing began…

item.title: Secrets of Success from Russell Brunson: What You Need to Know?
My in depth review on Bobby Jones's Cliqly aka Turnkeymailbiz
item.description: So what is Cliqly? According to Bobby Jones, Cliqly is an Email Business. In this in-depth review I have shared my honest opinion on what Cliqly really is and what it is not…

item.title: My honest review on Cliqly email marketing side hustle
item.description: Bobby Jones’s make money online program named Cliqly is now crushing the net. But is it worth to give it a trial or is another shiny object. I’ll review the result of one of Cliqly’s success stories to find the truth.
